login_desc:
Please wait a moment, we are logging you in.

If nothing happens, please use the button below.
java_modal_desc: You either don't have java installed or we could not find it! If you have java installed, please set the java path in the settings. If you haven't installed java yet, you won't be able to start Minecraft.
accounts_limit: You have reached the maximum number of accounts
nomcprofile: This account does not own Minecraft
settings_minimize_desc: Minimize the launcher after starting Minecraft
settings_richpresence_desc: Show the "Paying Blueknight Launcher" status in Discord
settings_ram_desc: How much memory (RAM) should minecraft be allowed to use?
settings_java_desc: Please only change this option, if you know what you are doing! (Java 21 or newer recommended)
settings_autoUpdates_desc: Should the launcher check for updates on startup?
settings_customframe_desc: Use a custom window frame instead of the OS default
settings_customframe_modal_desc: To apply this Setting, you need to restart BlueKnight
profileview_delete_areyousure: All the data of this profile will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
err_download: There was an error downloading the file!
